verbose_text: The exclusive detection of MMR gene methylation (mainly of MSH6) and/or LOH of D2S123 (flanking MSH6) in proximal / whole-colon SPP-FHP / CRC, in the majority of early lesions and in all histological types, appears to suggest that the MMR system plays an important role in the initiation of proximal / whole-colon SPP-FHP / CRC, which is in agreement with the high frequency of MSI (either MSI-L or MSI-H) in these lesions (58%).
